title: Enlightened
description: Passionate, intense, and formidable, the Jackson brothers return in the deeply erotic final instalment of The Untwisted series.   Nicholas and Rebecca are together and stronger than ever as they prepare for their upcoming wedding, but a series of misunderstandings threatens to ruin their big day â€“ and possibly the foundation of their entire relationship. Meanwhile, Nathan and Stella have ripped up their contract, but their new-found relationship becomes troubled and rocky as Stella hides a secret that could tear them apart forever.  Can Nicholas and Nathan ever truly escape their dark past and find the happiness they always thought would be out of reach?
author: Alice Raine
